title: stream_datum
description: Document to reference a quanta of an externally-stored stream of data.

StreamRange.title: StreamRange
StreamRange.description: The parameters required to describe a sequence of incrementing integers

stop.title: Stop
stop.description: Last number in the range is less than this number

descriptor.title: Descriptor
descriptor.description: UID of the EventDescriptor to which this Datum belongs

indices.description: A slice object passed to the StreamResource handler so it can hand back data and timestamps

seq_nums.description: A slice object showing the Event numbers the resource corresponds to

stream_resource.title: Stream Resource
stream_resource.description: The UID of the Stream Resource to which this Datum belongs.

uid.title: Uid
uid.description: Globally unique identifier for this Datum. A suggested formatting being '<stream_resource>/<stream_name>/<block_id>
